snippet: Speaking to conservatives, Newt Gingrich dismissed his rivals as part of an establishment that wants to "manage the decay" of the country rather than make bold changes.
abstract: Speaking to conservatives, Newt Gingrich dismissed his rivals as part of an establishment that wants to "manage the decay" of the country rather than make bold changes.
lead_paragraph: Newt Gingrich had a warning for the Republican establishment in his speech to conservative activists on Friday afternoon.

headline.main: Gingrich Delivers Anti-Establishment Message at CPAC
